slide.firstText: Nice to meet you, my name is
slide.secondTextMore: with a degree in Systems Analysis and Development from Faculdade Estácio de Sá.
slide.thirdText: I have been working in the development market for over 2 years, in addition to taking several professional courses in the area.

slide.secondText: I know how to play different instruments, such as:
slide.secondTextStrong: "Electric Guitar, Acustic Guitar, Bass, Ukulele and Keyboard".
slide.thirdText: I consider myself a "self-taught" person, that's how I learned to play all these instruments. In addition to having a great musical affinity.

slide.firstText: I like to challenge myself and achieve
slide.secondText: I managed to complete my first
slide.thirdText: I found myself doing physical activities again, I do bodybuilding regularly and my newest goal is to complete my first

card.timeline: During the period from 01/2022 to 09/2022 I worked as a Robotics and Programming Instructor within the Happy educational hub in Florianópolis.

activities.title: Activities
list: Create and teach Arduino, Construct 3, Unity, Scratch, LEGO, Roblox Studio and Minecraft classes for students.
Carry out tests and corrections on student projects.
Guide and explain to parents how the projects were being developed.
Prepare class presentation cases for enrollment conversion.

achievements.title: Achievements
list: With my entry into the educational hub, I was able to create complete Arduino class material.
I managed to publish several students within the itch.io platform.
I managed to maintain my student retention at a rate of 90%.

card.timeline: In the period of 09/2022, I started working as an Intern in Front-End Development within the company DOT Digital Group, where I have been working until the current period.

activities.title: Activities
list: Implementation of responsive web screens based on prototypes.
Implementation of visual and interactive resources.
Application of adjustments and updates to web pages of already implemented courses.
Monitoring the receipt, development and delivery of projects.
Alignment of product development with the team, proposing improvements and solutions to problems.
Carrying out tests on developed applications.
Review of code implemented by third parties.
Use of agile methodologies and Kanban system for development.

achievements.title: Achievements
list: Implementation of Style Guides without any adjustment requests from the QA team.
Project delivery without request for adjustments from the client.

card.description: is a company focused on developing Web solutions for companies, ensuring that companies are present on the Web.

is a powerful tool for musicians and producers who want to create immersive and inspiring sonic atmospheres, especially suitable for use in religious contexts such as churches and places of worship. This application offers a wide range of customization features, allowing users to adjust the tone and type of keyboard sound according to their preferences and needs.

is a paradise for cat lovers, offering an endless collection of adorable images of these charming felines. Powered by an API, this website allows users to browse through a multitude of cute cat photos, providing a captivating and enjoyable experience with every click.
